      • chunkSentence

        public List<String> chunkSentence(List<String> words,
                         List<String> tags,
                         List<String> pos)
        This is the method which does all the work and returns an updated set of chunk tags.
        Parameters:
        words - an ordered List of the words within the sentence.
        tags - an ordered List of the chunk tags within the sentence.
        pos - an ordered List of the POS tags within the sentence.
        Returns:
        an ordered List of the updated chunk tags for the sentence.
